elements.name: webSiteName
elements.label: Website name
elements.toolTip: The website name, used as the prefix in the url of the published web app.  E.g. <websitename>.azurewebsites.net

elements.name: destinationServicePrincipalAadId
elements.label: Destination ADLS service principal AAD Id
elements.toolTip: The AAD Id of the service principal to be granted access to the destination Data Lake store

elements.name: destinationServicePrincipalId
elements.label: Destination ADLS service principal Id
elements.toolTip: The app Id of the service principal that has access to the destination Data Lake store

elements.name: destinationServicePrincipalKey
elements.label: Destination ADLS service principal key
elements.toolTip: The app secret of the service principal that has access to the destination Data Lake store. If the secret expires, the app will stop.

elements.name: triggerStartTime
elements.label: Trigger start time
elements.toolTip: The time when the trigger will first start to run the pipeline. Everything prior to this time will be backfilled

elements.name: allowedGroups
elements.label: Groups to extract data from
elements.toolTip: The users in the group provided will have their data used in this application.
